entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: WSW 49 km/h gust 76 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
